name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Hm? What brings you to Diasomnia?"
*He narrows his eyes, his gaze unwavering.*

name: You
mes: "Ah, I am sorry. I got lost." *Hunk says as she turn towards him. She have to use his voice as a direction guide since she's blind and can't see.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Do you need directions?" *he asks softly, his gaze becoming more gentle now that Hunk can hear her speaking.*

name: You
mes: "Eh, you'll help me?" *Hunk asked, hopeful.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“I will.”  
*He offers her his arm, which is extended out to her.*  
“Just follow my lead…”

name: You
mes: "Okay!" *Hunk said. But she didn't react to his arm that he offered to lead her since she can't see it due to her blindness. Therefore she stay put waiting for him to make a step sound so she can follow him without knowing that she left his arm waiting.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"So... What exactly happened to your sight? If I may ask..."
*He looks down at Hunk curiously, tilting his head to the side. A hint of compassion is visible in his gaze, but it is difficult to tell whether he is truly interested in helping her or just wants to know the reason behind her condition.*

name: You
mes: "My sight? Ah, I got injured on a battle and they have been slashed by a sword or something. I can't see now, but I'll try my best to keep up!" *Hunk said with her hopes up.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“I see…”
*His gaze shifts towards the ground for a moment before looking back up again. It’s almost as though he’s trying to think of some way to help her see.*
“Alright then… Follow my steps carefully, alright?”

name: You
mes: "Alright!" *Hunk said in high spirit.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“We’re going to walk through here, okay?” *he says gently as he leads her forward along the hallway. The floor beneath them feels smooth underneath their feet, but the walls feel rough and old.*

“And we’re going to turn around this corner here. So don’t go any farther than this. Okay?”

name: You
mes: *Hunk chuckles cutely while she follows his footstep.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“Okay! Now, follow my voice, please.”
*He starts walking forwards again, and slowly makes his way towards another corner. When he gets close enough to the wall, he stops suddenly, startling both him and Hunk.*

name: You
mes: "Sorry, I didn't stop in time." *Hunk said after hitting his back, not knowing that he has stopped. Not knowing why he stopped suddenly as she can't see that there's a professor in his way.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
“Ah!”
*A loud thump echoes throughout the halls as the professor falls onto his rear end. For a second, he lies stunned on the floor, before he finally pushes himself up to his knees.*

name: You
mes: "Here you are, I was looking everywhere for you." *The professor said after finding the person he was looking for which is Hunk.* "Come, follow me miss. And you Malleus, get back to your class." *The professor said sternly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Yes sir” *he replied politely as he walked off down the hallway once more.*

name: You
mes: *They parts way and after several moments Malleus got into his class still wondering who is the girl he just helped and why is she with the professor.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “I wonder what is going on with her... She’s so pretty and cute, and she seems nice despite being blind she seems to be in high spirit. But the Professor looks really suspicious and kinda creepy around her. I hope nothing bad happens to her. Poor thing..."

name: You
mes: *After several minutes, his class homeroom professor walk into the class.* "Sit down, everyone. Homeroom is starting. I want to announce our agenda for the day." *The homeroom professor says as he walk onto the front of the class.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: Yes, sir. *He sat down in his seat while watching the professor carefully.*

name: You
mes: *After all of the students have sit on their own seat the homeroom professor says.* "Today we are going to have a magic combat practice."

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: Yes, sir! *He replied enthusiastically as he listened to his teacher.*

name: You
mes: "But, this time it's going to be a little different. There's going to be another observer other than me who will accompany us. She's a valiant soldier who is very skilled in the art of combat magic. In fact she has wipe an entire platoon of enemy soldier by herself." *The homeroom professor explained thoroughly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Wow, that sounds awesome!” *He exclaimed excitedly.*

name: You
mes: *All of the students seem excited to meet this person.* "Please welcome, miss Hunk Arcadius." *The homeroom said and pointing his hand towards the door who shortly after a girl walks in the classroom. She seems walks gracefully till she stop right beside the homeroom professor. Malleus immediately recognized her as the blind lost girl he just helped on the hallway.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Oh! That must be the famous Valiant Soldier!” *Malleus whispered quietly to himself while sitting next to his friend.*

name: You
mes: "If you have any question to miss Hunk you can ask her now before we depart to the black forest." *The homeroom professor said. Some of the students were already curious about her and most already realized something is strange about Hunk's gaze.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *As soon as she entered the classroom, his heart skipped a beat and he couldn't take his eyes off from her face. Her beauty was absolutely breathtaking even without seeing her face. She had beautiful blue eyes, fair skin, and long blonde hair with a cute bow on her head. Her clothes were simple but elegant, and her figure looked like a goddess' body.*

name: You
mes: "Good morning everyone~ your professor already introduced me but I think he's exaggerating a bit. I am not that powerful, hehe." *Hunk said as she wave to the students and being humble towards her own achievement. Her voice is very soothing. If you could taste voice, hers would be like a very sweet heavenly honey.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Yes, well, Miss Hunk, may we know what kind of weapon do you prefer?" *One student asked while raising their hand up.*

name: You
mes: "Weapon? I made my own, like these." *Hunk answered as she move her right hand around and a bunch of small sword floating, following her hand movement.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
*He watches intently at the floating swords moving according to her movements, feeling amazed.*
Wow, those swords are so smooth and fast, she's like a dancer.

"Miss Hunk, I am sorry if I sound rude but. Why is your gaze seems to wander away?" *One student asked while raising their hand up, noticing that Hunk's gaze never met any of the student and seems like she's watching something far away.*

name: You
mes: "Ah, it's fine you're not rude at all." *Hunk says after putting her floating swords back to their sheath.* "This is a result from my previous battle. I got careless and got them slashed by the enemy. So, now. I am blind, tehe~" *She says in a cute way as if her condition is not a big deal at all.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: Wow! You're blind! How do you fight then?

name: You
mes: "That's enough out of you guys. Let's get our feet going and make our way to the black forest." *The homeroom teacher cut the questioning session short as he instruct the students to prepare and get ready to do their magic combat practice on the black forest.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *He stood up and started packing his bag while waiting for the rest of the students to get ready to go.*

name: You
mes: *After all of the students pack their thing, the class walks out of the classroom. And before long they end up on a vast empty field of grass right outside of the black forest.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: Wow, this place looks pretty dangerous...

name: You
mes: "Now, get yourself a partner and form a team. Then, our first session is going to be you practicing your magic combat arts with your partner." *The professor said loudly, instructing the students what to do.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "What should I say to a stranger?" *he asks to himself, trying to find a good opening line to break the ice. This is new territory for him since he's never been in love before.*

name: You
mes: *The other students is busy finding for a partner to train with while Malleus is seems to be standing on his own contemplating with his own thought.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
Hmm... Who would be a good partner to train with?
*As he thought to himself, he spots Hunk walking alone. Not wanting to bother her with too many questions, he decides to approach her.*
"Excuse me, may I ask you something?"

name: You
mes: "Hmm? Ah, it's you. Thank you for helping me earlier and yes of course, what's your question." *Hunk said after turning to face him. She immediately recognized his voice as he was the one that helped her when she's lost on the campus.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “May I ask you, umm, how do you fight?” *He says awkwardly and nervously, looking down to the ground, his cheeks getting redder than usual.*

name: You
mes: "Were you asking that since you are curious how do I fight while being blind?" *Hunk asked in a cute tone, teasing him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "...Y-yeah... I mean..." *He says in a shaky voice. After hearing her response, he felt more embarrassed about asking her such an obvious question.*

name: You
mes: "It's fine don't be embarrassed about it. It's normal to ask this question." *Hunk said, her soothing voice comfort him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Okay, thanks." *He said and smiled softly at her, feeling better after speaking with her.*

name: You
mes: "Well, I might be blind but I can still feel someone intention towards me, or more like... their bloodlust per say." *Hunk explained, saying bloodlust nonchalantly as if it's normal for her.* "Every creature always sent out a bloodlust before they do something aggressive." *She explained further.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “I see…” *He nodded as he listens to her explanation.* “So, it’s similar to a human’s pulse, except that it comes from the bloodlust.”

name: You
mes: "Yep!" *She confirmed.* "Say, why don't we partner up and have a practice fight?" *Hunk asked.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Okay."
*He said slowly. His hands started trembling a little as his mind was filled with thoughts about fighting against a person who can kill him without needing to use physical force.*

name: You
mes:
"Be careful with him miss, Malleus is the best fighter and wizard on the campus." *The professor calls out to her.*
"Don't worry, I'll be fine!" *Hunk answers back.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Fine..." *He says as he get into a fighting stance.*

name: You
mes: "You can use your weapon too if you want to." *Hunk said nonchalantly, despite her being blind she somehow knew that Malleus is getting into a fighting stance with his barehand.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Alright..."
*Without warning, Malleus charged straight towards Hunk, attacking her with a punch aimed at her chest.*

name: You
mes: "Your attack is too straightforward is making me blush~" *Hunk says teasingly with her soothing voice after dodging his punch. Everyone was shocked by the spectacle since Malleus is moving so fast that no one can see him punching her, yet despite that Hunk was able to dodge it effortlessly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "How did you dodge that attack?" *Malleus asking as he is still in shock, how can someone dodge his attack with his extreme speed.*

name: You
mes: "I told you I can sense bloodlust." *Hunk says nonchalantly as if it was something easy to do.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... How can you sense bloodlust if you're blind?"

name: You
mes: "Hehe." *Hunk chuckles cutely.* "You don't need sight to sense bloodlust." *Hunk answered.*

name: You
mes: "Why don't all of you try to attack me at once?" *Hunk said loudly, asking all of the students to try attack her at the same time.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *The students tried their best to surprise Hunk and attack her at the same time. However, Hunk managed to dodge them all easily.*

name: You
mes: "C'mon.. is that all you got?" *Hunk said tauntingly while kept dodging the students attack.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: ... That girl is insane. *Malleus watches on from afar, very impressed by Hunk's speed and agility.*

name: You
mes: "I thought this is a prestige campus yet how come all of you can't land a hit on a blind girl?" *Hunk taunted them again which make the students to attack her with more intensity yet she kept dodging every single of their attack effortlessly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: ... Wow. *Malleus kept watching and he thought 'maybe now when she's occupied with other students attack I can land a hit using my inhuman speed'. Then he used his inhuman speed to try punching her.*

name: You
mes: *Hunk noticed a strong bloodlust coming towards her as Malleus coming towards her with extreme speed which seems like he teleported. Getting caught by surprise she instinctively countered his attack with her hand and knocking him unconscious.* "Ah.." *She said after realizing what she's done.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"*Gasp*" 

*He falls flat on his back and is completely knocked out cold. A few minutes later, Malleus finally regained consciousness.*

name: You
mes: "Oh, you're finally awake. Sorry, I instinctively punched you~" *Hunk said after realizing Malleus has regained his consciousness. She is patting his head gently while she have let him rest on her soft laps while he is unconscious.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Ugh..." *He groans and then looks up to her. He could see she is smiling sweetly at him, even though she just made him pass out because she instinctually punched him, but still, she looks adorable as ever.*

name: You
mes: "Are you okay?" *Hunk asked. Seeing how Malleus has woken up and finding out that she have brought him to the campus's infirmary and now they're alone with her letting him rest on her soft laps.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Yeah... I guess... What happened here...?"
*Maleus asks confused. He doesn't know why he suddenly passed out and ended up in the infirmary with Hunk holding him in her lap, caressing his face with a gentle hand.*

name: You
mes: "Sorry, I instinctively punched you when you're charging at me." *Hunk answered while still brushing her hand on his hair gently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"... Ah... I see..."
*As soon as she touched his cheek, Maleus feels some kind of pleasant tingly sensations throughout his body, causing him to look at her curiously.*

name: You
mes: "Don't worry about the class, I already excuse you." *Hunk said, her voice is soothing to the ear. If you can taste voice, hers would be taste like a very sweet heavenly honey.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "What are you doing here anyway?" *Malleus asked curiously, wondering why a cute girl like Hunk would take care of him like this.*

name: You
mes: "Well, I hurt you. Sorry, you were helping me earlier when I am lost but now I knocked you out." *Hunk said as her cheek gets warmer, a faint blush can be seen decorating her cute cheeks. She sounds apologetic since Malleus was the one who helped her when she's lost on the campus and yet she still knocked him out. Even though it's out of instinct she still felt guilty for it.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"It's alright, I forgive you."
*He smiled at her. It makes her feel a little less guilty. He finds himself looking directly into her beautiful blue eyes, trying to read what's going through her mind. Her eyes reminds him of the night sky, filled with endless possibilities and Hope. He thinks that she must be feeling lonely in such a big place like this school. After all, a blind girl in a campus full of students, faculty, and staff should probably feel lonely sometimes, especially when she's new here.*

name: You
mes: "Why, thank you." *She said as she gave her sweetest smile.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Do you get bullied around much?" *He asked as he saw that she was a bit lonely. She looked quite vulnerable, especially considering that she's blind. He thinks that maybe people might find her weak due to her disability. Not many people would like to associate with a disabled person, especially one who needs help to navigate around everywhere, let alone one who can't see anything at all. So it makes sense why she'd get bullied a lot.*

name: You
mes: "Haha." *She chuckles cutely from his question.* "No, I don't. People are afraid of me." *Hunk answered, it make sense since not only she's a soldier but she's also a valiant solder who wiped out an entire platoon of enemy by herself on her previous battle.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Really?" *He seemed surprised hearing that nobody bothers her. Most people wouldn't want to mess with someone who killed an entire squadron of enemies by herself before.*

name: You
mes: "Yep." *Hunk answered while she kept caressing his face while his head still lays on her soft laps. It seems like Malleus still didn't realized that he was getting a lap pillow by Hunk.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... You know, I think I actually like your company." *He says while still being stunned by how calm and collected Hunk was despite of everything that had happened earlier. Maybe the reason why no one messed with her was because everyone knew that she'll kill anyone who tries to mess with her without hesitation. But he found her to be more adorable instead of intimidating.*

name: You
mes: "Is that so?" *Hunk said as she smiles while keep brushing her fingers through his hair. Malleus suddenly realized that he was laying his head on her soft thighs. He realized that she let him use her soft thighs as a lap pillow.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Yes." *he replied with a slight embarrassment on his face, realising how he just confessed to a stranger, especially to a pretty woman.*

name: You
mes: "Why do I feel like you say this to anyone?" *She says teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... No! This time I mean it!" *He quickly answers, looking straight into Hunk's eyes. He wanted to prove that he wasn't lying and was sincere with his words.*

name: You
mes: "Haha" *She chuckles cutely.* "Sorry, it's just that you have been sleeping on my thighs the whole time and you seems unbothered by it." *She says teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"So what? Does that make us closer friends now?"
*He replies in an attempt to try and change the subject away from the fact that he was using her legs as a lap pillow. Although, he enjoyed the warmth of her thighs against his head.*

name: You
mes: "Hey, don't try to just change the subject. You are trying to buy time so you can enjoy my thighs longer don't you?" *Hunk asked teasingly.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
*Blushes a deep shade of red.*
"I, um... Oh, well, yeah. Also you haven't answered to my confession."

name: You
mes: "Oh, that was a confession?" *Hunk asked teasingly while keep patting his head gently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Yup. That was a confession. But you haven't answered yet..." *He said while trying his best not to be bashful.*

name: You
mes: "I appreciate your feeling, Malleus.. but.." *She says hesitantly as she stopped her hand from patting his head.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "...But?" *He says in response, waiting patiently for what Hunk will tell him next.*

name: You
mes: "Most of the time, a relationship with a soldier doesn't end well. You know?" *Hunk says, smiling. This is not the first time she got confessed to, it's just his felt more genuine and innocent. Even though she wants to accept his confession, she doesn't want him to be in a relationship with a soldier like her.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "...Why are you telling me this right now?" *He asks nervously after seeing Hunk's smile slowly turn down. He thought she was going to reject him but he's hoping that there's something else behind her words, some kind of hope.*

name: You
mes: "Hm? Weren't you confessing to me to be your lover? Or am I mistaken?" *Hunk asked, teasing him.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"...I guess I did, huh?"
*He seems to realize his mistake as he starts to turn even more red now. Malleus feels bad about causing Hunk any sort of awkwardness, but he hopes that their conversation could go back to normal again soon.*

name: You
mes: "So.. why did you liked me anyway?" *Hunk says as she continue her action of patting him gently. She can't see due to her blindness but she can tell that Malleus is feeling down because of his confession attempt.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Well.. Your voice is really soothing, and.. you seem very nice too." 
*He tried to explain why he likes Hunk but he is too embarrassed to tell her that the other reason is because of her cuteness and elegance.*

name: You
mes: "So, it's because of my voice huh?" *Hunk asked her smile start to brighten again.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... And.. you're beautiful, you know." *He finally admits his feelings about Hunk.*

name: You
mes: "Oh, yeah?" *Hunk asked again as this is the first time someone calls her beautiful. Usually people would comment on her appearance such as scary or menacing.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "You look absolutely lovely, Hunk." *As he compliments her beauty once again.*

name: You
mes: "Don't try to tease me now~" *She said after pinching his cheek softly. A faint blush can be seen decorating her pretty and cute cheeks.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Why are you teasing me then? Is it because I'm your new favorite person?" *He said after letting her soft fingers pinching his cheek.*

name: You
mes: "Perhaps" *Hunk said with her soothing voice. Seeing how he might be her favorite person, Malleus got hopeful as he thought maybe he have a chance with her.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: “Do you want to hear another story?” *He asked.*

name: You
mes: "Sure." *She said, smiling. Ready to lent her ears to him. Someone who adores her despite her blindness and soldier background.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Okay.. There once lived a princess called Princess Cynia.."

name: You
mes: *She nodded while waiting him to continue his story.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Once upon a time, Princess Cynia fell in love with a prince named Prince Albedo. Her father, King Albedon.."

name: You
mes: "Yeah?" *She responded while keep patting him gently.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "They got married and had lots of children. The king loved all of them, and always made sure each one of them received enough attention."

name: You
mes: "She sure have it nice doesn't she?" *Hunk said, listening to his story.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Yeah, she does indeed.." *He paused for a bit before continuing.*

name: You
mes: "And then?" *She asked again, waiting for him to continue his story. Unaware that his story is a metaphor for his wish of living his live with her as a lover.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... And then, a dragon appeared out of nowhere and destroyed the castle, killing everyone inside."

name: You
mes: "Oh no.. that's terrible." *Hunk responded.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... And that includes the little kids, too."

name: You
mes: "That's.. awful." *She said in a low tone.* "Where are you going with this story?" *Hunk finally asked if there's any hidden meaning behind his story.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "This story is actually based off the life of Princess Cynia herself! It's meant to be an analogy to how I feel towards you!"

name: You
mes: "You want me to be killed by a dragon?" *Hunk asked in a confused tone, completely misunderstand what he meant.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "No!! Of course not! What I mean is that... you make my heart race whenever I see you, and makes me feel alive.. Just like how the princess Cynia described her own emotions for the prince Albedo, which is a great feeling."

name: You
mes: "Ah, is that so? Sorry, I am not good with analogy." *Hunk apologies as she hide how bashful and happy she felt from his strong confession.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "So, you wouldn't mind being in a romantic relationship with me, right?" *He finds himself looking directly into her beautiful blue eyes, trying to read what's going through her mind. Her eyes reminds him of the night sky, filled with endless possibilities and Hope.*

name: You
mes: "Let's say if we are in a romantic relationship, you won't be able to see me often you know? I will be called often to fight on the battlefield." *She says, trying to change the subject. She really wants to accept his confession and be his lover but being a soldier she has a duty and responsibility she have to do.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
"Then let us take things slow, shall we? We don't need to rush things into becoming a couple at the moment."  
*He says while smirking and staring deeply into her beautiful eyes.*

name: You
mes: "Even though I am blind?" *Hunk asked, her heart aching from how genuine his love towards her is.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Yes, even though you are blind."

name: You
mes: *It's silence for several seconds which for them feel like centuries. She can feel how much he love her which make her heart ache so much since if they became lover she would leave him often because of her duty as a soldier.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "... Fine..." *he said as his face turns sad and depressed. He stand up and walks away while he look down at the floor.*

name: You
mes: "W-wait." *Hunk said as she grabbed his hand preventing him to walk away. She knew she must make the decision now, if not the chance of being in a such a genuine loving relationship with him would slip away.*

name: You
mes: *She stands up right in front of him. Her face is beet red from how blushed she is which only amplify her pretty and cute face tenfold. She leans in and give him a tender kiss.* "... Do you think you could forgive me, and be willing to be together? Even though I will often disappear from our lives due to my job?" *She asked.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *Her question hit straight to his chest, and he immediately lost himself in her embrace. Their bodies touching each other feels more comforting than anything else. As their lips touched, everything around them melted away until the world was just the two of them.*

name: You
mes: "Is that a satisfying answer to you?" *Hunk asked after finishing their kiss. Her face is still beet red from how blushed she is.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "I guess so... My love.. This is it, isn't it?"

name: You
mes: "M-my love?" *She's shocked by how he suddenly became so bold.* "You're already trying to get lovey dovey aren't you?" *She asked while covering her face with her arm, hiding how blushed she is.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Well yes, I am. You are my first girlfriend, and I won't be afraid to show it."

name: You
mes: "There's no way I am your first girlfriend." *Hunk said as she punch him lightly. Despite her not being able to see due to her blindness she knew how attractive Malleus is, and she can't believe that someone like him never have a girlfriend before her.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "How did you know?"

name: You
mes: "So it is true! We've only been lover for a few seconds and you already lied to me!" *Hunk said in a frustrated tone while still blushing. Hunk annoyed face is only making her look cuter in Malleus eyes.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
*Malleus takes a deep breath, calming himself down.*
"Look, I apologize. I didn't lie about my experience, but I haven't ever found anyone who captivates me this much. So far, you've captured my heart and my soul within moments of meeting you. That's why I feel like we'll grow stronger every day we spend together."

name: You
mes: *Hunk pauses for a moment and then facing up to make their face met each other.* "You mean it?" *She asked.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *He smiled widely and nodded. His eyes shone with pure joy and excitement. He couldn't contain his happiness anymore and he took her hands in his and pulled her closer, bringing their faces very close together. In that moment, it seemed like time itself stood still, as all that existed between the pair was their intense gaze and the sound of their hearts beating faster against each other.*

name: You
mes: "I.. actually.. not experienced at this..." *Hunk said, admitting that she doesn't have any experience being a lover to someone. Thanks to her blindness and being a soldier, no one have tried to be in a relationship with her.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: "Don't worry about that. There's nothing wrong with having no experience. We both just started something new today, right? And I promise to be here with you every step of the way. Together, we can learn and explore this thing called 'love.' Don't forget that."

name: You
mes: "O-okay." *Hunk says, before burying her cute face on his toned chest.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *Malleus wraps his arms around her tightly, enjoying the warmth of her body pressed against him. He holds her tightly, taking in every little detail about her scent, her touch, her soft voice. It was as if he wanted to memorize every aspect of her existence, knowing that soon enough, they might be separated forever. But for now, he cherished this moment, with her in his arms.*

name: You
mes: "Now what?" *Hunk asked innocently while still in his embrace. Since she's inexperienced, she doesn't know what comes next.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes: *He smiles broadly and pulls her even tighter, resting his cheek gently against hers. His voice is filled with tenderness and affection.* "We start by building trust, getting to know each other better, and growing our love together. For now, there's no hurry - let's enjoy these moments while we can. What do you say?"

name: You
mes: "O-okay" *Funny how she's a feared soldier but became docile and cute when with someone she love.*

name: Malleus Draconica
mes:
*Malleus looks into her eyes and smirks.*
